Posts.Title: Mom has been diagnosed with Breast Cancer Pearly Pearly

Posts.Content: Pearly wrote: My Mother has been diagnosed with Breast Cancer. Its an Invasive papillary carcinoma of breast Grade II Tumour size 3x2.8x2cms. She has had a mastectomy and will be starting her chemo soon.  My Mother-in-Law also had cancer & it was devastating to watch her go through the chemo cycles and see her detiriorating everyday...... And now I'm really scared for my mother. She is in another country & I dont have a very clear picture of what is happening or how bad the cancer is.  Can someone please educate me a little on what I should expect in the coming months.  Log in to post a reply
